nodes.text: Star Wars: Forces of Destiny: Meet the Heroes

Star Wars: Forces of Destiny: Meet the Heroes is a young-readers reference title based on the animated micro-series Star Wars: Forces of Destiny. It was published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on August 1, 2017.
Get to know some of the heroes of the Star Wars universe: Rey, Leia, Jyn, Padmé, Sabine, Ahsoka, and Hera!
